special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
Whenever one or more counters are removed from a battle you protect, mill that many cards.
[b]3 Defense[/b] Stage 2
Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, you gain 2 life.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Whenever Into Oran-Rief is defeated, return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
